name: psychological_weather
prompt: Daily forecasts now include emotional climates. Write a report for a city suffering a storm of apathy.
decoded: A storm of apathy has hit the city, causing a general sense of disinterest and disengagement. People are feeling disconnected and unspired, leading to a lack of motivation and enthusiasm. It is recommended that the city take steps to promote community engagement and foster a sense of purpose to combat this emotional climate.
